text_block_list.text:
With the Satsuki Sho quickly<n>approaching, I've altered
Winning<n>Ticket's training to have a more<n>concentrated
focus on the race.

I'm thinking over how to improve her<n>training regimen to
help secure her<n>first Classics win, when Ticket<n>herself
pays a visit.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey there! Oh, don't mind me. Feel<n>free to keep working.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Now, it should be with the exhibit<n>stuff...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah... An old notebook...
I'm watching the distracted racer<n>rummage around, when—
Ring, ring...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Huh? My mentor's calling.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Your mentor? Oh! The one who got<n>the URA award!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
We haven't spoken since I<n>congratulated him after the
ceremony.<n>I wonder what's up... Hello?

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
Hey, kid. Are you well? I hear that<n>new trainee of yours is
stirring up a<n>storm, so thought I'd give you a call.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah, Tickezo... I mean, our new<n>member, Winning Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
So? You confident she can do it? The<n>Derby's the top of the
top. Only real<n>highfliers make it into that race.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Obviously we intend to win. All of<n>Team Sirius is carrying on
your dream<n>of conquering the Derby.

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text: Hahaha! Right, what I said in my<n>acceptance speech.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
No one can beat her in terms of drive.<n>She's been dreaming
about the Derby<n>since she was little.

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
Good, that long-held dream is a<n>strength that will serve her
well in the<n>Derby.

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
I'm not trying to sound like an idealist<n>or anything, but the
Derby is where<n>ability and emotion collide.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Yeah... I got the picture pretty clearly<n>when I saw you talking
about it.

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
In the end we didn't win, but all that<n>experience leading up
to it wasn't for<n>nothing.

text_block_list.name: Predecessor
text_block_list.text:
Anyhow, you've got this old man<n>excited to see her in the
Derby.

We talk more about the team and its<n>members until saying
goodbye.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
WOW, that was a surprise. I was<n>wondering what was up
when I heard<n>my name.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
He said hi and that he wants you to<n>make a real Derby
trainer out of me.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
He said hi and that he wants you to<n>make a real Derby
trainer out of me.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, you got it! So long as you make<n>me a Derby
champion!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Wait... Is it that I win or thatyou lead me to win? I'm allconfused now.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh right, I was looking for something!<n>I used it at the exhibit,
so it should be<n>around here...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah, here it is! My Derby notebook!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I accidentally left it in this box, I<n>guess.

She shows me a notebook, which has<n>childlike scribbles
about the Derby<n>scrawled all over it.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
This is a record of all the Derbies I've<n>seen and what I
thought about each<n>one. And...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: My own path to the Derby is outlined<n>in here.

Winning Ticket takes out some photo<n>stickers and puts
them in the<n>notebook.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: There, all done!

The three friendly rivals—Winning<n>Ticket, Biwa Hayahide,
and Narita<n>Taishin—now have their precious<n>memories
stored in the notebook.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
The next page'll be photos from my<n>win at the Derby.
Ehehe...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I was a scrawny little kid growing up.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
My mom was so worried she had me<n>doing all sorts of
sports. She'd take<n>me to see them a lot too.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Sports train both the body and mind!<n>She sounds like one
tough mommy,<n>right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But, like, the first race I ever saw live<n>was the Derby. I said
it before, but it<n>really blew my socks off.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
The proud winner, the racers who ran<n>against all odds and
didn't quit till the<n>very end, and the countless cheering<n>
fans...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
On the way home, racing was all I<n>could think about. I was in
tons of<n>sports classes, but I told my mom I<n>was quitting
them all.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Thinking back on it, it was way too<n>sudden. But mom said
"We'll just<n>have to go out and buy running<n>shoes!"

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I'm suuuper bad at studying, but I<n>really stuck with racing.
You see, it's<n>because of the Derby that I got to<n>meet you
and all my friends!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: So... It's my mission to race in the<n>Derby and win it!
It isn't easy to keep running toward a<n>childhood dream.

But Winning Ticket's still going after<n>hers. The memory she
has of<n>watching the Derby that day has<n>never faded.
choice_data_list:
We'll make sure you write about your victory in
that notebook!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Sorry for going on about the Derby for<n>so long. I get so
carried away talking<n>about it.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You really love it, huh?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You really love it, huh?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, you bet I do! I'm confident I<n>can't be beaten when it
comes to<n>passion!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, by the way... I was gonna take<n>this home, but I'll give it
to you<n>instead.
The bright-eyed enthusiast hands<n>over her Derby notebook.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
It's absolutely packed with stuff<n>about the Derby, so give it
a good<n>read! It'll make your love for the race<n>even
stronger!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
All right, see you tomorrow! Can't<n>wait for another day of
training!

After I watch her run off, I take a look<n>at the notebook she
left me.

On the front, written in giant, childlike<n>scribbles, is "Derby
Notes." Somehow,<n>the clumsy writing seems to really<n>
stress how strongly she feels.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff, huff, puff...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Hm? Is that...

It's dark outside. But that doesn't<n>stop someone from
running around<n>the training course.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Phew... 'Kay, next I'll do ten sprints.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Taishin... She's still training this late at<n>night.

As I watch her running in the<n>darkness, I am reminded of an<n>
obvious, unchanging truth.

Winning Ticket is not the only one<n>who's determined to win.
The Derby<n>is a dream and an honor for all racers.
